subject: Re: [junit] Testing the exception
msgSnippet: ... I write code like this: boolean caughtOne = false; try { // do something that should throw } catch (Exception e) { caughtOne = true; }
messageBody:
> getResult has a exception at some statement which has already been
> caught in the getResult itself. I want that the assertEquals should
> catch the excepton.
> what to do?

I write code like this:

boolean caughtOne = false;
try {
// do something that should throw
} catch (Exception e) {
caughtOne = true;
}

assertTrue(caughtOne);
